subsection.name: Looking for support or want to propose an enhancement for the dozer Framework?
subsection.p: For community support or dozer enhancement requests check out the Support Forums. We value your enhancement suggestions and want to build something of value to the Java community.

subsection.name: Think you've found a bug?
subsection.p: Please enter a bug in the bug tracker. We value your support there. We can't fix bugs we don't know about!
